title: Creative Lead (Presentations Design)
overview: The Creative Lead (Presentations Design) position at Superside is responsible for managing, leading, and driving creative excellence in presentation design, collaborating with account teams, and mentoring a team of creatives to deliver impactful and high-quality creative work for global brands.
description:
Superside is looking for inspired and purpose-driven Design Directors to take our company‚Äôs creative capabilities to the next level. In this role, you will spearhead our globally distributed team of top-talent creatives, across various capabilities such as Branding, Landing Page design, Ad and social creative, Print Design with a special focus on Presentation design.


We provide strategic creative solutions for customers and partners such as Meta, Amazon, Salesforce, Reddit and Google. Our subscription-based model allows us to create meaningful long-term customer relationships and the high-quality work that our talented teams produce.

extras.title: What You'll Do
content: Manage the overall creation, workflow and output quality of your projects
Provide expertise in Presentation design, ensuring high-quality creative output and innovative approaches in all presentation projects
Present creative work and direction to customers of a wide range of global brands
Drive and lead creative excellence specifically in the realm of presentation design, setting a high standard for visual storytelling, effective communication, and impactful presentations
Collaborate with your dedicated account teams to successfully grow and develop our customers
Manage a number of simultaneous projects, staying on time and budget
Shape creative strategies and output to meet our customer's needs and goals
Connect with our customers on an ongoing basis, building trust through creative delivery to increase their business value
Inspire, mentor, and manage a team of creatives, taking responsibility for their growth and development
Develop, and grow yourself and your team, and act as a creative-thought leader within the organization

extras.title: What You'll Need to Succeed
content: BA or higher within Design, Creative, Comms, or similar fields
4+ years of experience as a world-class creative lead in an international top-tier creative agency or in-house design team in a global tech company
Strong portfolio of creative work across multiple capabilities, with a focus on Presentation design
Excellent presentation and design skills using the Adobe Creative Suite, PowerPoint, Keynote, Google Slides & Figma
Understanding and direction of the use of Motion within Presentation design to aid in telling compelling stories
Excellent understanding of creative interpretation of data visualization and infographics
Ability to quickly learn processes and multi-task projects with great detail
High level of knowledge and craft to provide top-notch design and direction
Ability to always deliver pixel-perfect quality on time and within budget
Excellent English verbal and written communication skills
Bias for action, proactive, customer-centric, and execution-driven mindset
Experience managing creative projects in their entirety and leading a high-performing team (Designers, Art Directors, etc)
